Infrigidate.help: Fires a frigid beam of cold at a single target. This beam dramatically reduces the targets attack rate, movement speed and Defense. Infrigidate draws so much heat out of the target that the damage of any of its Fire attacks will be reduced. Recharge: Slow
Infrigidate.targetHelp: Your attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage have been reduced

messages.attackerHit: You reduce the attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage of {PlayerDest}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your attack rate, movement speed, Defense, and Fire Damage.

Ice_Shield.help: Casts a rock hard Ice Shield on one of your allies and grants them Defense to Melee, Lethal attacks and damage resistance to Cold and Fire damage. You cannot stack multiple Ice Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Glacial Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Ice_Shield.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Melee, Smash, Lethal), Res(Cold, Fire)
Ice_Shield.targetHelp: You now have greater Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold and Fire damage.
Ice_Shield.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing and Lethal attacks and increase their Resistance to Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Ice_Shield.victimHit: You now have greater Defense to Smashing and Lethal attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold and Fire damage.

Snow_Storm.help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. The torrent winds of the Snow Storm are enough to bring down flying foes. Recharge: Slow
Snow_Storm.targetHelp: Your attack rate and running speed have been reduced by the Snow Storm. The Torrent winds are hindering your ability to Fly.
Snow_Storm.attackerHit: You slow the attack and movement speed of all foes near {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
Snow_Storm.victimHit: Your attack speed and movement rate have been slowed by {PlayerSource}.

Glacial_Shield.help: Envelopes an ally in gleaming Glacial Ice. Its crystalline structure has refracting properties that grants the target good Defense against Area Effect, Ranged, Energy and Negative Energy attacks. Glacial Shield also grants the target some damage resistance to Cold. You cannot stack multiple Glacial Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Ice Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Glacial_Shield.shortHelp: Ranged, Ally +DEF(Ranged, AoE, Energy, Negative), Res(Cold)
Glacial_Shield.targetHelp: You now have greater Defense to Energy and Negative Energy attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold damage.
Glacial_Shield.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Energy and Negative Energy attacks and increase their Resistance to Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Glacial_Shield.victimHit: You now have greater Defense to Energy and Negative Energy attacks and have greater Damage Resistance to Cold damage.

Frostwork.help: Covers an ally in a thick layer of Frost. The frost can absorb the impact from enemy attacks, effectively increasing your ally's maximum Hit Points for a short time. Frostwork also grants your ally resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Frostwork.targetHelp: Your maximum health is increased and you have some resistance to toxic damage.
Frostwork.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} increases the maximum Hit Points or {PlayerDest} and grants them some resistance to Toxic damage.
Frostwork.victimHit: {PlayerSource} has increases your maximum Hit Points with {PowerName} and grants you some resistance to Toxic damage.

Arctic_Fog.help: Your mastery of Cold allows you to hide yourself and all nearby allies within thick Arctic Fog. Arctic Fog makes you and your allies harder to see and increases your Defense to area effect, melee and ranged attacks, as well as your resistance to Slow, Fire, Cold, and Energy damage. You cannot use any other Concealment type powers while using Arctic Fog. Recharge: Slow
Arctic_Fog.shortHelp: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF, +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Slow)
Arctic_Fog.targetHelp: The Arctic Fog is making you more difficult to detect. This increases your Defense and gives you some resistance to Fire, Cold, Energy and Slow.

Benumb.help: Numbs a single target to its very core. Benumb reduces the target's core body temperature, dramatically weakening them. A Benumbed target's Damage and Regeneration Rate are greatly reduced. Additionally, the affected target's secondary power effects are all weakened. The target's powers' effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all weakened. Recharge: Long
Benumb.targetHelp: Your Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects have all been reduced.
Benumb.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects of {PlayerDest}.
Benumb.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Damage output, HP Regeneration and power effects.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!
{PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Sleet.help: Summons a Sleet Storm at a targeted location. Sleet deals minimal Cold damage to anything that passes through the storm. It also Slows the affected foes and severely reduces their Defense and resistance to damage. Many foes may even slip and fall trying to escape the storm. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
Sleet.targetHelp: The Fog is causing cold damage to you and has reduced your damage potential, resistance, attack rate and running speed.

Heat_Loss.help: Heat Loss drains the heat from your enemies and transfers that energy to your allies in the form of Endurance. All foes near the selected target may experience a Heat Loss, which will drain their Endurance, Slow them, and reduce their Damage Resistance. Each enemy target that is successfully drained of Heat will expel that energy to all your nearby allies, granting them Endurance and a boost to their Endurance Recovery. Some Endurance and Recovery will also be transferred directly to you and any allies near you. Recharge: Long

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} drains the heat from you with their {PowerName}!
